s3.message: Fixed: Context menu opens delayed if many exception rules for cookies are defined

s2.message: Implemented workaround for crash with Mozilla ActiveX Plugin is installed

s6.message: Spaces not removed in attribute selectors of element hiding rules any more

s5.message: Sidebar: Selected item is kept when switching tabs and closing/opening sidebar

s4.message: Preferences dialog: OK button now becomes available immediately when starting typing in the editor
